entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is the one who gave a nervous laugh. He is also being addressed by Yaxley.

entities.name: yaxley
entities.description: Yaxley is the one who is interrogating Cattermole's wife and making threats to Ron.

entities.name: cattermole
entities.description: Cattermole is being addressed by Yaxley and is related to Ron.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione let out a little squeak of horror when she heard what Yaxley was saying.

relationships.description: Yaxley is making threats to Ron.
Yaxley addressed Hermione when she let out a little squeak of horror.
